name: Nebula Hot Toys MMS534 1/6 action figure (Avengers : Endgame)
description:
Earth Mightiest Heroes failed to stop Thanos from collecting the Infinity Stones, which he used to wipe out half the universe’s population. Nebula was among those who survived after the events of Avengers : Infinity War, leaving her and Rocket as the only remaining Guardians alone on Titan with Tony Stark. She will have no choice but to work with others and finally see the true value of family.

Longed for by many Marvel fans, Hot Toys is excited to officially present Gamora’s adopted sister - Nebula in sixth scale collectible figure from the upcoming Avengers : Endgame.

The figure is carefully crafted based on the image of Nebula in the movie with meticulous workmanship, featuring a newly developed head sculpt with prominent cybernetics details, a newly developed body highlights Nebula’s prosthetic arm revealing intricate mechanical parts, perfectly tailored Ravenger’s jumpsuit with fine textures, iconic weapons including blaster and batons, lightning effect accessory attachable to the baton, a movie-themed figure stand, and an interchangeable graphic card.

The Luphomoid assassin is waiting for you to bring her to your ever-expanding Avengers : Endgame collection !

What's in the box of Nebula Hot Toys MMS534 ?

An authentic and detailed likeness of Nebula in Avengers : Endgame

Specially applied metallic black-colored painting on the mechanical arm with a detailed design

Newly developed body with over 28 points of articulation

Approximately 29.5 cm tall

A newly developed head sculpt with blue and purple skin texture, mechanical design and movie-accurate facial expression

Each head sculpt is specially hand-painted

Seven (7) interchangeable hands (right with glove) including:

- One (1) right hand for holding a blaster

- One (1) pair of fists

- One (1) pair of relaxed hands

- One (1) pair of hands for holding a baton

Costume :

One (1) pair of burgundy red-colored boots

One (1) burgundy red-colored one-piece battle suit with asymmetry shoulder armor

One (1) burgundy red-colored belt with pistol holster on the thigh

Weapons :

One (1) blaster

Two (2) long batons

Accessories :

One (1) specially designed graphic card with character icon

One (1) baton handle

Two (2) translucent blue colored lightning effect accessories (attachable to baton)

A movie-themed figure stand with movie logo and character name

This item is sold with a sealed brown shipper box.
